distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for tiff fixes the following issue:

Security vulnerabilities fixed:

- CVE-2016-5102: Fixed a buffer overflow in readgifimage() (bsc#983268)
- CVE-2019-6128: Fixed a memory leak in the TIFFFdOpen function in tif_unix.c (bsc#1121626)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: Buffer overflow in the readgifimage function in gif2tiff.c in the gif2tiff tool in LibTIFF 4.0.6 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (segmentation fault) via a crafted gif file.
notes.title: CVE description

notes.text: The TIFFFdOpen function in tif_unix.c in LibTIFF 4.0.10 has a memory leak, as demonstrated by pal2rgb.
